itemDescription: Norwegian/British singer, musician, composer and nurse

wikipedia_page.main: Claudia Lorraine Scott (born 8 October 1957) is a Norwegian/British singer, musician and composer associated primarily with country music and American folk music genres. She is trained as a nurse and works part time.She was born in Newcastle, but hails from Bergen, Norway, and moved to Nashville in 1999. She has won the Spellemann Award twice, in 1985 and 2014.
